text: Stripe Inc. stores this data in the USA.

RaeNotes uses certain trusted third parties to help us provide, improve, protect, and promote our Services.
These third parties will access your information only to perform tasks on our behalf in compliance with this Privacy Policy, and we'll remain responsible for their handling of your information per our instructions.
We may disclose your information to third parties if we determine that such disclosure is reasonably necessary to: (a) comply with any applicable law, regulation, legal process, or appropriate government request; (b) prevent fraud or abuse of RaeNotes or our users; (c) protect RaeNotes's rights, property, safety, or interest; or (d) perform a task carried out in the public interest.
Where

RaeNotes's third-party providers store data in the USA.

To provide you with the Services, we store, process, and transmit information in the United States.
We collect and associate with your account, the information you provide to us when you do things such as sign up for your account, upgrade to a paid plan (like your username, email address, profile picture, password, payment info, including your name, credit or debit card information, billing address, and details of your transaction history).
We collect and use the following information to provide, improve, and protect our Services:
We keep your information secure and continue to work on features to keep your information safe in addition to things like access control list, encryption of data at rest.
We may disclose your information to third parties if we determine that such disclosure is reasonably necessary to: (a) comply with any applicable law, regulation, legal process, or appropriate government request; (b) prevent fraud or abuse of RaeNotes or our users; (c) protect RaeNotes's rights, property, safety, or interest; or (d) perform a task carried out in the public interest.
With Whom we share data with:

We may share information as discussed below, but we won't sell it to advertisers or other third parties.
RaeNotes uses an access-control list (ACL) to specify which users are granted access to files, as well as what operations are allowed on given files.

Where

RaeNotes stores Your Content in data centers owned and operated by Amazon Web Services.
To make that possible, we store, process, and transmit Your Content as well as information related to it.
We use cookies to provide, improve, and protect our Services.
Your devices (depending on their settings) may also transmit location information to the Services.
We also collect information from and about the devices you use to access the Services.

We collect information related to how you use the Services, including actions you take in your account (like sharing, editing, viewing, and filter files or folders).
We use this information to improve our Services, develop new services and features, and protect RaeNotes users.
To make that possible, we store, process, and transmit Your Content as well as information related to it.

But please note: (1) there might be some latency in deleting this information from our servers and back-up storage; and (2) we may retain this information if necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, or enforce our agreements.
When you sign up for an account with us, we'll retain information you store on our Services for as long as your account is in existence or as long as we need it to provide you the Services.

If you provide Personal Data, you acknowledge and agree that such Personal Data may be transferred from your current location to the offices and servers of RaeNotes and the authorized third parties referred to herein located in the United States.

If you provide Personal Data, you acknowledge and agree that such Personal Data may be transferred from your current location to the offices and servers of RaeNotes and the authorized third parties referred to herein located in the United States.

Here we describe how we collect, use, and handle your personal information when you use our website, platform, and services ("Services") .
We also collect and use personal data for our legitimate business needs.
